node.excerpt: In 2020 CE, Present time, It is in German, almost at centre of the world, where two of them started out fighting verbally straight away…
So, I had to make a in a room movie, as I was in college hostel, then with many real life experiences I chose a topic and we made this film…
Making Experience: My first ever film making experience, writing part was completed in an hour, with what I some days back imagined about…
